channel.title: Dynasty Dodian source
channel.description:
Well, ive decided to release this to the world. The dodian sources keep getting harder and harder to find and so i release this to help dodian prevale.i use the name: Devilmccary, i dont credit myself in the source files or anything, just no point
Some of the features
Special attack (work 100%) All owner,admin commands Flawless combat system All skills work Woodcutting - Automatically fletches "Logs" to shafts without asking you how many you want to fletch. Player Emotes work (About 80%) All dodian areas are accessable (Exept ladder on ice mountain, Portals for rune ess mining)
I hope you guys like it, i would like to see some feedback or maybe fixes that i can apply for my own Dynasty dodian source(help would be good)
[url=http://[/url]
My work on client: New and improved compiler that works with all jdk versions Added npc's: Guard at yanille,Chickens at yanille, few major and minor bug fixes, Fire giants,Some bosses drops and drop rates, Fixed some doors, Grammar fixes, Exp rates fixes, Stats display fix Added ::dropparty (just like the old dodian had, but has some nulls in it for drops, sliding peaces that wont crash you)
Bug: When dropping item it says error connecting to server and refreshes you, Monster combat/dmg needs to be fixed, No fishing spots at cathebry,Rune fullhelm bugged
More notes on the source
Some pictures
[img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B2_zpsc978ceae.png[/img] [img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B1_zps27dee593.png[/img] [img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B3_zpsce92af10.png[/img]
[url]http://www.upload.ee/files/3979678/Source.rar.html][/url]
My work on client: New and improved compiler that works with all jdk versions Added npc's: Guard at yanille,Chickens at yanille, few major and minor bug fixes, Fire giants,Some bosses drops and drop rates, Fixed some doors, Grammar fixes, Exp rates fixes, Stats display fix Added ::dropparty (just like the old dodian had, but has some nulls in it for drops, sliding peaces that wont crash you)
Bug: When dropping item it says error connecting to server and refreshes you, Monster combat/dmg needs to be fixed, No fishing spots at cathebry,Rune fullhelm bugged
More notes on the source
Some pictures
[img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B2_zpsc978ceae.png[/img] [img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B1_zps27dee593.png[/img] [img]http://i881.photobucket.com/albums/ac19/gapukas/B3_zpsce92af10.png[/img]

item.title: Dynasty Dodian source
item.dc:creator: @gapukas gapukas
item.description:
@gapukas wrote:

Well, ive decided to release this to the world. The dodian sources keep getting harder and harder to find and so i release this to help dodian prevale.i use the name: Devilmccary, i dont credit myself in the source files or anything, just no point

Some of the features

Special attack (work 100%)
All owner,admin commands
Flawless combat system
All skills work
Woodcutting - Automatically fletches “Logs” to shafts without asking you how many you want to fletch.
Player Emotes work (About 80%)
All dodian areas are accessable (Exept ladder on ice mountain, Portals for rune ess mining)

I hope you guys like it, i would like to see some feedback or maybe fixes that i can apply for my own Dynasty dodian source(help would be good)

[url=http://[/url]

My work on client:
New and improved compiler that works with all jdk versions
Added npc’s: Guard at yanille,Chickens at yanille, few major and minor bug fixes, Fire giants,Some bosses drops and drop rates, Fixed some doors, Grammar fixes, Exp rates fixes, Stats display fix
Added ::dropparty (just like the old dodian had, but has some nulls in it for drops, sliding peaces that wont crash you)

Bug: When dropping item it says error connecting to server and refreshes you, Monster combat/dmg needs to be fixed, No fishing spots at cathebry,Rune fullhelm bugged

More notes on the source

Some pictures
